thread.title: Donald Trump Is The Ultimate Frontrunner
thread.title_full: Donald Trump Is The Ultimate Frontrunner

author: Samer Kalaf
title: Donald Trump Is The Ultimate Frontrunner
text:
Go to permalink Photo: Susan Walsh/ AP 
On top of everything else, Donald Trump is the scummiest kind of sports fan. The Patriots were losing 28-3 in the third quarter when he ditched his Super Bowl watch party in Florida: 
You know what happened next: The Falcons gagged and the Patriots won in overtime . Trump pretended like nothing had happened. 
The guy has proven many times over that heâ€™s incapable of shame, so an embarrassment like this is nothing, but the record should show that this haggard cretin stopped watching before the magic happened. I hope someone stole his mementos. Recommended Stories
